content: ni mi bzy bucket hat abbreviations us terms o dmc - double magic_ring crochet pattern o chain - chain o single_crochet - single_crochet o increase - increase work two stitches into one stitch o slip_stitch - slip_stitch o blo - back loop only o * * x # - repeat stitches inside asterisk x number of times this pattern is for 11 12-inch fashion dolls not humans and will fit standard doll head adjust diameter for different hairstyles pattern notes o this pattern is worked in the round skill level without slip stitches between row o double magic_ring video materials https //youtube com/shorts/8kwbphrpw o preferred - bzypeach dk pima cotton 1o si=wt4fs4sfid8xihtf or tencel yarn in 1 or 2 colors o 2mm metal crochet hook o tapestry needle o scissors for personal use only all rights reserved by bzypeach llc instructions us terms q round 1 dmc double magic_ring chain 1 single_crochet 6 6 q round 2 increase in each stitch 12 q round 3 *single_crochet increase* x 6 18 q round 4 *single_crochet increase single_crochet* x 6 24 q round 5 *increase single_crochet 7* x 3 27 q round 6 single_crochet blo in each stitch 27 q round 7 - 8 single_crochet in each stitch 27 __round 7 __round 8 q round 9 begin adding in 2nd color *single_crochet in color 2 single_crochet 2 in color 1* x 9 27 q round 10 *single_crochet 2 in color 2 single_crochet in color thank you for purchasing this pattern 1* x 9 27 and supporting a small business post your finished project and tag q round 11 stop using color 1 all #bzybucket & @bzypeach remaining stitched in color 2 *single_crochet increase single_crochet* x 9 36 questions please send a message q round 12 *increase single_crochet 2 * x 12 48 on instagram to @bzypeach q round 13 slip_stitch in blo 48 finish off and sew in ends for personal use only all rights reserved by 2 bzypeach llc recommended yarn is bzypeach dk 100% pima cotton or 100% tencel the pattern can be worked in solid variegated or multiple colorways https //www bzypeach com/market shape hat as desired if stitches are too loose and shaping doesn t stay in place use same colored yarn to sew into desired shape for personal use only all rights reserved by 3 bzypeach llc
